channel.title: Compile and Run.server help!(for you)
channel.description: Ok guys this is a quick help about compilers and run servers..so..lets get going. 1. First what we have to do is open your compile and replace the content with this. [code] @echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause [/code] 2. save that and also when it says this: [code]"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server [/code] you replace the [code]jdk1.5.0_09[/code] then if you need to (if you don't have the latest java) relace it with your version then save and exit 3. Now..for the runserver..replace it with this [code]@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server[/code] and then save and exit 4. Have fun on your server and this was copy and pasted out of my server which is pimpscape source. i will attach a unedited version to this post 5. if this helped don't forget ++rep!

item.title: Compile and Run.server help!(for you)
item.dc:creator: @0wn3d_n00b Ooo Java
item.description:
@0wn3d_n00b wrote:

Ok guys this is a quick help about compilers and run servers…so…lets get going.

  1. First what we have to do is open your compile and replace the content with this.
@echo off
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server
pause
  1. save that and also when it says this:

"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server
you replace the jdk1.5.0_09
then if you need to (if you don’t have the latest java) relace it with your version then save and exit
3. Now…for the runserver…replace it with this

@echo off title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
and then save and exit
4. Have fun on your server and this was copy and pasted out of my server which is pimpscape source. i will attach a unedited version to this post
5. if this helped don’t forget ++rep!

Read full topic
